Produce.title: Produce
Produce.description: Represents a type of produce (fruit or vegetable).

name.description: Name of the produce (e.g., Apple, Tomato).

variety.description: Variety of the produce (e.g., Red Delicious, Perita).

category.description: Category of the produce (e.g., Fruit, Vegetable).

Price.title: Price
Price.description: Represents the price of a specific produce item at a specific time.

produceId.description: Reference to the Produce item this price belongs to.

price.description: Price per crate of the produce.

date.description: ISO 8601 string of when the price was recorded.

produces.description: Stores information about each type of produce. Anyone can read, only admins can write.

prices.description: Stores the time-series price data for all produce. Anyone can read, only admins can write.
